com.mikehelmick.proc
Interface Clock

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Clock>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Example.PoorClock, FakeClock
public interface Clock
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Clock>

Clock is a marker interface. You have to decide how to represent clocks in your system. Do so by implementing this interface.

Since this interface extends Comparable you must provide a compareTo method. This will ensure proper ordering of events generated by your code.

Method Summary

          Please override the toString method and provide something reasonable since this is used in output.
